CustomField.formula:
IF(ISBLANK( Available__c ),null,
IF((MOD(( Available__c /60)/60,1)*60) >= 10,
TEXT(FLOOR( ( Available__c/60 )/60)) + "h : " + TEXT( FLOOR(MOD(( Available__c/60 )/60,1)*60)) +"min",
TEXT(FLOOR( ( Available__c/60 )/60)) + "h : 0" + TEXT( FLOOR(MOD(( Available__c/60 )/60,1)*60)) +"min"
))
CustomField.label: Total Available
